scripts.build-dev: browserify src/index.ts -p tsify  > editor/bundle.js && node scripts/make-bundle.js
scripts.build-prod: browserify src/index.ts -p tsify -g unassertify -g envify -g uglifyify -p common-shakeify -p browser-pack-flat/plugin | uglifyjs -cm > editor/bundle.js && node scripts/make-bundle.js
